Chapter 11: Policy and The Future

The future of HIV/AIDS control in Vietnam does not lie on a clear path. International funding is being withdrawn due to the improving economic condition in the country. This will bring a raft of changes that fundamentally change how care is given. While all stakeholders try to remain positive there is a lot to be worked out to ensure our control of HIV/AIDS continues to grow.
